amendment.description: To provide for color certification reports.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1050 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1050 proposed by Senator Brown for Senator Enzi. (consideration: CR S5699-5705; text: CR S5703) To provide for color certification reports.
